ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE capabilities
2-megapixel camera/camcorder; digital audio player; FM radio
Bluetooth for handsfree devices; MicroSD expansion; organizer
Up to 5.25 hours of talk time and 400 hours of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 5220 XpressMusic Unlocked Phone with 2 MP Camera, MP3 Player, MicroSD Slot--International Version with No Warranty (Red)
